div.p: This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/cvx defines the following codes:

title.value: CVX codes used in this IG

description.value: All CVX codes from `http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/cvx` used in this IG. Provided so the FHIR server can perform expansions.
